attributes.action: cease the extortionate regular payments to EU to be squandered by EU whilst UK is still staggering from the current national financial disaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £5 million to EU every day?  We cannot afford it, now or ever.  Charity begins at home, British wealth for British citizens, governed by a properly elected and representative parliament in a fully democratic state without foreign interference or continental diktats.
